verses.verse: My God <S%H410><s%>, my God <S%H410><s%>, why have you forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me <S%H7350><s%>? why are you so far from helping <S%H3444><s%> me <S%H1697><s%>, and from the words of my roaring <S%H7581><s%>?
O my God <S%H430><s%>, I cry <S%H7121><s%> in the daytime <S%H3119><s%>, but you hear <S%H6030><s%> not <S%H3915><s%>; and in the night season, and am not silent <S%H1747><s%>.
But you are holy <S%H6918><s%>, O you that inhabit <S%H3427><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
Our fathers <S%H1><s%> trusted <S%H982><s%> in you <S%H982><s%>: they trusted, and you did deliver them <S%H6403><s%>.
They cried <S%H2199><s%> unto you <S%H4422><s%>, and were delivered: they trusted <S%H982><s%> in you <S%H954><s%>, and were not confounded.
But I am a worm <S%H8438><s%>, and no man <S%H376><s%>; a reproach <S%H2781><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, and despised <S%H959><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
All they that see <S%H7200><s%> me laugh me to scorn <S%H3932><s%>: they shoot out <S%H6358><s%> the lip <S%H8193><s%>, they shake <S%H5128><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%>, saying,
He trusted <S%H1556><s%> on the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that he would deliver <S%H6403><s%> him <S%H5337><s%>: let him deliver him <S%H2654><s%>, seeing he delighted in him.
But you are he that took <S%H1518><s%> me out of the womb <S%H990><s%>: you did make me hope <S%H982><s%> when I was upon my mother <S%H517><s%>'s breasts <S%H7699><s%>.
I was cast <S%H7993><s%> upon you from the womb <S%H7358><s%>: you are my God <S%H410><s%> from my mother <S%H517><s%>'s belly <S%H990><s%>.
Be not far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H6869><s%>; for trouble is near <S%H7138><s%>; for there is none to help <S%H5826><s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> have surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me <S%H47><s%>: strong bulls of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> have beset me round <S%H3803><s%>.
They gaped <S%H6475><s%> upon me with their mouths <S%H6310><s%>, as a ravening <S%H2963><s%> and a roaring <S%H7580><s%> lion <S%H738><s%>.

I am poured out <S%H8210><s%> like water <S%H4325><s%>, and all my bones <S%H6106><s%> are out of joint <S%H6504><s%>: my heart <S%H3820><s%> is like wax <S%H1749><s%>; it is melted <S%H4549><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of my bowels <S%H4578><s%>.

My strength <S%H3581><s%> is dried up <S%H3001><s%> like a potsherd <S%H2789><s%>; and my tongue <S%H3956><s%> cleaves <S%H1692><s%> to my jaws <S%H4455><s%>; and you have brought <S%H8239><s%> me into the dust <S%H6083><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.

For dogs <S%H3611><s%> have surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me <S%H5712><s%>: the assembly of the wicked <S%H7489><s%> have enclosed <S%H5362><s%> me <S%H3738><s%>: they pierced my hands <S%H3027><s%> and my feet <S%H7272><s%>.
I may tell <S%H5608><s%> all my bones <S%H6106><s%>: they look <S%H5027><s%> and stare upon me <S%H7200><s%>.
They part <S%H2505><s%> my garments <S%H899><s%> among them <S%H5307><s%>, and cast lots <S%H1486><s%> upon my vesture <S%H3830><s%>.
But be not you far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord: O my strength <S%H360><s%>, haste <S%H2363><s%> you to help me <S%H5833><s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%>; my darling <S%H3173><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the dog <S%H3611><s%>.
Save <S%H3467><s%> me from the lion <S%H738><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%>: for you have heard <S%H6030><s%> me from the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the unicorns <S%H7214><s%>.
I will declare <S%H5608><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> unto my brothers <S%H251><s%>: in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the congregation <S%H6951><s%> will I praise you <S%H1984><s%>.

You that fear <S%H3373><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, praise <S%H1984><s%> him <S%H2233><s%>; all you the seed of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, glorify <S%H3513><s%> him <S%H1481><s%>; and fear him <S%H2233><s%>, all you the seed of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For he has not despised <S%H959><s%> nor abhorred <S%H8262><s%> the affliction <S%H6039><s%> of the afflicted <S%H6041><s%>; neither has he hid <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from him <S%H7768><s%>; but when he cried unto him <S%H8085><s%>, he heard.
My praise <S%H8416><s%> shall be of you in the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation <S%H6951><s%>: I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> before them that fear him <S%H3373><s%>.

The meek <S%H6035><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>: they shall praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that seek <S%H1875><s%> him <S%H3824><s%>: your heart shall live <S%H2421><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>.

All the ends <S%H657><s%> of the world <S%H776><s%> shall remember <S%H2142><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and all the kindreds <S%H4940><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall worship <S%H7812><s%> before you <S%H6440><s%>.
For the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s: and he is the governor <S%H4910><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

All they that be fat <S%H1879><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%>: all they that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the dust <S%H6083><s%> shall bow <S%H3766><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H2421><s%>: and none can keep alive his own soul <S%H5315><s%>.
A seed <S%H2233><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him <S%H5608><s%>; it shall be accounted to the Lord <S%H136><s%> for a generation <S%H1755><s%>.
They shall come <S%H935><s%>, and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> unto a people <S%H5971><s%> that shall be born <S%H3205><s%>, that he has done this <S%H6213><s%>.
